creator: Kuehnberger@web.de
text:
The avalon-framework.jar in the distribution doesn't contain the 
org.apache.avalon.framework.logger.Log4JLogger class. It's because the avalon-
framework-cvs-20020315.jar in the distribution was build without log4j.jar in 
the classpath.

If anyone want it, I can send the avalon-framework.jar I build from CVS, that 
contains the missing class.

See the whole thread under:

http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=fop-user&m=102775894031871&w=2

I've replaced the Avalon Framework JAR in CVS (HEAD and maintenance branch). It 
now includes Log4J support.

If you want to download it you can also use this link:
http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/*checkout*/xml-fop/lib/avalon-framework-cvs-
20020806.jar?rev=1.2
creator: jeremias.maerki@outline.ch
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
